Class BigFraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • numeric.BigFraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BigFraction
extends java.lang.Number
    A class representing fractions of BigInteger.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        equals returns true, iff numerator and denominator are equal. note, this is numeric equality, only iff both fractions are simplified.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - object to which this is compared
        Returns:
        true, iff numerator and denominator are equal.
